duties_responsibilities.duty: Prospect and identify potential clients in target industries and market segments.
Conduct effective sales presentations and product demonstrations to showcase our MSP offerings.
Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, understanding their business needs and aligning our services to meet their requirements.
Prepare and present persuasive sales proposals and quotes to prospective clients.
Collaborate with our technical team to develop customized solutions based on client requirements.
Negotiate contract terms and pricing to ensure profitable sales deals.
Meet or exceed monthly sales targets and contribute to overall revenue growth of the company.
Stay updated on industry trends, technology advancements, and competitive offerings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
